```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(tinytable)
x <- mtcars[1:5, 1:4]
tt(x) |> 
  # rows: i
  style_tt(i = 2, italic = TRUE) |>
  # columns: j
  style_tt(j = c(1, 3), background = "blue!5!white", width = "2cm") |>
  # cells: i and j
  style_tt(1, 2, rowspan = 2, colspan = 2, align = "c", background = "pink")
```

```{r, eval = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
# TODO: position should ignore headers
# rule should accept flags
devtools::document()
pkgload::load_all()
options(tt_bootstrapOptions_placement = "H")
x <- mtcars[1:12, 1:8]

pkgload::load_all()
tt(x, output = "latex") |> 
ibGroup(i = c(
  "I like (fake) hamburgers" = 3,
  "She prefers halloumi" = 4,
  "They love tofu" = 7))
```


```{r, eval = FALSE, echo = FALSE}

  ibGroup(i = c(
      "I like (fake) hamburgers" = 3,
      "She prefers halloumi" = 4,
```
